name: Don't Touch My Light
description: Puts the player in the position of the metaphorical energy we put into defending out brain from negative thoughts. Where we can collect keys to close doors off to people allowing us to fight our problems head on but become weaker in the process. Or, we can face our problems head on and attack full force or stay close to our core and defend. WASD movement. Click and hold to shoot. (xbox controls) A to jump, Analog to move, triggers to aim and shoot.
